head.supplied: 16/4/78 ¶ I send you, dear Mr Baker, a copy of the 10th vol of the Fragmenta, just completed. I should value a copy of your Mauritius flora ¶ J. Baker (1877). There is a copy in the library of the Roy...

div.p: Tipped into copy 1 of vol. 10, Fragmenta phytographiea Australiae, call no. 581.994 M701, Oak Street Library, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: The letter is tipped-in on the front free-endpaper, below M’s MS dedication:’Joanni Gilberto Baker volumen modestum scriptore oblatum’ [This modest volume is offered to John Gilbert Baker by the author]. For on-line image see https://hdl.handle.net/2027/uiuo.ark:/13960/t4qk4893k?urlappend=%3Bseq=7 . 16/4/78

p.seg: I send you, dear Mr Baker, a copy of the 10th vol of the Fragmenta, just completed. I should value a copy of your Mauritius flora

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: J. Baker (1877). There is a copy in the library of the Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne, but see M to W. Thiselton-Dyer, 28 August 1878.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
